name: statement-viewer
description: Static web application for viewing Stated protocol statements

scripts.update-lib: cd ../stated-protocol-parser && npm run build && cd ../statement-viewer && rm -rf lib && mkdir -p lib && cp ../stated-protocol-parser/dist/esm/index.js lib/ && cp ../stated-protocol-parser/dist/esm/index.js.map lib/ && cp ../stated-protocol-parser/dist/esm/index.d.ts lib/
